description: System-generated unique identifier for this equipment model record; used as the primary key and for joins to related tables.
Audit datetime when this model record was created or last updated, stored as a high‑precision timestamp string (likely local/UTC unknown; confirm with SME).
Manufacturer’s model designation for the equipment (alphanumeric code used in catalogs and specifications).
Identifier of the equipment manufacturer; foreign key to a manufacturer reference table.
Name of the reference table/entity that holds manufacturer details for the foreign key; used to resolve the manufacturer identifier; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the corresponding record in a prior/legacy system, enabling cross-system mapping and migration lineage.
Name of the originating table in a prior/legacy system for this record, supporting traceability and data lineage.
Code indicating the asset’s classification (e.g., truck, trailer, equipment), typically a foreign key to an asset category reference.
Reference source or table identifier for the asset category code, specifying where to resolve category descriptions; likely a reference pointer; confirm with SME.
